definition: amiable (manner)/unassuming/written in plain language/easy to take in
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes
amiable and approachable (idiom); easy-going/modest and unassuming/(of writing) plain and simple/easy to understand

sentences.english: I really admire your courage in biting your toe nail in public.
sentences.chinese: 我真信服你敢于在平易近众场所咬脚趾甲的勇气。

sentences.english: There's a falseness, a craftedness, but it's a kind of folk craftedness.
sentences.chinese: 有种虚伪和造作，但也是一种平易的造作。

sentences.english: It's next to the People's Cinema.
sentences.chinese: 它在人平易近影剧场隔邻。

sentences.english: B lamb is as dear to a poor man as an ox to the rich.
sentences.chinese: 贫平易近眼中的一只羊，贵似富人一头牛。

sentences.english: “Anna is just a very easy person to get to know, that’s why she had a lot of friends, ” Mr. Guirguis said.
sentences.chinese: 安娜非常平易近人，纯真善良，所以她有许多朋友。

sentences.english: Led by ray sheriff launched large-scale relationship with 100 chase.
sentences.chinese: 以雷警长率领的警平易近近百人展开了大规模追捕。

sentences.english: The government called on people to hold on to the tradition of respecting the old.
sentences.chinese: 当局招呼人平易近对于峙敬老的传统。

sentences.english: You might say that Michael is clothed in "approachability."
sentences.chinese: 你可以说，麦可的服装让他平易近人。

sentences.english: The activity enrich colorful, take to have the heavy race special features.
sentences.chinese: 活动富厚多彩，带有浓郁的平易近族特色。

sentences.english: The deepened reform has injected a flow of fresh vitality into our national economic and social development.
sentences.chinese: 深化更始为国平易近经济和社会成长注入了新的活力。

sentences.english: Kindness to the enemy means cruelty to the people. (p. 163)
sentences.chinese: 对仇人的慈悲便是对人平易近的残酷。

sentences.english: Elegant and supple tannins on the palate give the wine gentle structure with approachability.
sentences.chinese: 优雅，温和，饱满的丹宁使得该酒平易近人。

sentences.english: The local people's response to the new security measures was enthusiastic.
sentences.chinese: 当地居平易近对新的安全措施反应热烈。

sentences.english: In the days of Queen Victoria, the British colony expanded rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 在维多利亚女王期间，英国殖平易近地敏捷膨胀。

sentences.english: She is guiding the shop to help citizen to fix the tyre up with the standard etiquette.
sentences.chinese: 她在用最标准的礼节，为市平易近指引补胎的路线。

sentences.english: She was a successful advertising executive, highly intelligent yet easygoing.
sentences.chinese: 她是个成功的广告主管，非常聪明但又平易近人。

definition: variant of 簡練|简练[jian3 lian4]
